website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, luxurious bodywash that will last you for months.
pros: Large bottle lasts a long time
Spreads easily and washes off without leaving a film on your skin
cons: Some users have complained about the pump breaking

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already..
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit pricey for body wash.. Bottle is huge though The scent is classic and luxurious 2 pumps is all you need, great lather and last long I am very happy with this purchase overall. 100 dollars + for a body wash that has the potential to last all year round, Good good deal
customer_reviews.author: E.Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second bottle of body wash. Smell is great and last. The only problem I have had with it. Is the pump. It just doesn't do the job. I went and found another pump at a ulta store. It worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like 1 million bucks
customer_reviews.text: How can you get over that smell this is the one for me

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great soap. It smells really good. You don’t need a lot of it to clean your whole body.
customer_reviews.author: F. Sanchagrin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped defective.... the pump on the bottle was broken when it arrived and liquid was all inside the box! They tried to ship it in a pouch then resorted to putting a pvc pipe around the top of the bottle. Not a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Awhhh
customer_reviews.text: This was a Chistmas gift. A few years ago another was offered as a bonus buy. So I was not sure I would find the one . I got it in time for Christmas and thas was amazing. They all love this and all the women around do too.

customer_reviews.title: very good product, received very quick
